name: Stroll (Game Off 2021)
description:
This is a game about a stroll on a night park where some of the bugs aren't what you'd consider normal.

-- DISCLAIMER --

Due to time, the gameplay had to be cut to a single concept to fit into the Game Off deadline, The 2D art of the character was made by the amazingly talented Danilo Almeida (danilo4lmeida@gmail.com) and 3D models, Shaders and Programming was done by myself. We'll update the rest of the game as soon as we get the time to work more on the project (within a week or two).

Controls:

Up, Down, Left, Right: Movement (Tank Controls)
Z: Run
X + Left / Right (While Running): 90 Degrees Turn
